plot: What is success? We look at the lives of ordinary people : a teacher, a best friend, and a mother. Through their stories the filmmaker realizes success isn't solely based upon wealth, celebrity, or fame -it's about inspiring others
title: To Have Lived
plot_es: What is success? We look at the lives of ordinary people : a teacher, a best friend, and a mother. Through their stories the filmmaker realizes success isn't solely based upon wealth, celebrity, or fame -it's about inspiring others
